title: I’m a Loner, but My Girlfriend Is Too Cute - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Anti-social Protagonist   Average-looking Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Clumsy Love Interests   Cohabitation   Early Romance   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mystery Solving   Parallel Worlds   Senpai-Kouhai Relationship   Time Paradox
author: Studio.T   スタジオ.Ｔ
description:
Narumi Kaneshiro is a high school student who has been living in the shadows. Today, too, he eats his lunch in the bathroom during his lunch break.

One day, on a rooftop that happens to be open, he meets Futaba Mifune, who is also a loner.

“Let’s eat together.”

With that one word, a youth love story began.>
